Articles.Content:
A simple game with simple rules, each player either posts as if part of a text adventure, or posts a command, depending on what's in the post above them, for example....

Me: AT END OF ROAD, You are standing at the end of a road before a small brick building. Around you is a forest. A small stream flows out of the building and down a gully.

KasperVld: examine building

Vexx32: It's a small brick building. It seems to be a well house.

Me: enter building

...And so on.

Go!
examine surrroundings

INSIDE BUILDING

You are inside a building, a well house for a large spring.

There are some keys on the ground here.

There is tasty food here.

There is a shiny brass lamp nearby.

There is an empty bottle here.
Eat the fooooods
Delicious!

Taste food

(also Sal, I like the new avatar).

NINJA!

You look around, wondering what to do next

(we all ninjaed eachother!)
Finaly, it taste like RP-1
Examine keys.
Most of them are broken, but one is a gold-plated SRB key. Who knows what it unlocks?
Examinate the lamp
The lamp is old, but there is still a wick and oil.

Hmm this isn't Kerbally enough, going to reboot.....

Jebediah is standing in front of the VAB, it is a nice sunny day and a small rocket sits on the launchpad, to his experienced eye he knows it won't get too high though.

Exits are West (VAB) East (Launchpad) North (SPH) South (Tracking station)
Go to SPH(10)
You are standing in the Spaceplane hangar, there is no craft here but you see a pod and a few other parts, Kerbal engineers and scientists mill about.
ask the engineers for the new prototype of SSTO
The nearest engineer looks at you in a puzzled way.
ask him again with when puting sun glasses on.

*You turn to your right*

There are cluttered scaffolds of various plane parts and there are Kerbal scientists running about.

Lol..

The engineers haul a pod to the center of the SPH, and asks what part do you want next?
Exit the SPH.

Jebediah is standing in front of the VAB, it is a nice sunny day and a small rocket sits on the launchpad, to his experienced eye he knows it won't get too high though.

Exits are West (VAB) East (Launchpad) North (SPH) South (Tracking station)
Jeb decide to go say hello to the guys of the tracking station
Arriving at the tracking station you notice A big red button, a big green button, a leaver and a ladder
Jeb say hello loudly
The sound echoes around. Nobody seems to be home.
